snippet: Jared Spurgeon's power-play goal in the third period helped the Minnesota Wild notch their season-high fifth straight win, 3-2 over the Calgary Flames on Monday night....

headline.print_headline: Wild Douse Flames, Stretch Win Streak to 5
headline.main: Wild Douse Flames, Stretch Win Streak to 5

lead_paragraph: Jared Spurgeon's power-play goal in the third period helped the Minnesota Wild notch their season-high fifth straight win, 3-2 over the Calgary Flames on Monday night.
